name: DraftSpotting Technologies Private Limited
description: Developer of an artificial intelligence-driven contract management platform designed to draft and execute legal contracts. The company's platform advises businesses about existing contracts without any additional cost or fees and sends customized reminders and invoices, enabling businesses to procure payment quickly and avoid all the confusing paperwork.
